timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to expose this file? I saw it is used in OpenAPI/Swagger annotations so I expect it is used during openapi.json generation but not sure if it is needed at runtime
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
it is needed at runtime since the openapi.json/.yaml will Reference the dmnDefinitions.json content.
This is a standard mechanism for OAS
replies.author: tarilabs

timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: Discussed with Mario, yes. He suggested for me to place code comment indeed for this known Quarkus extension <> Codegen limitation of interaction
replies.author: tarilabs

timeline.bodyText:
What about make this error fatal (aka propagate) if
isMPAnnotationsPresent() || isIOSwaggerOASv3AnnotationsPresent()

can't implement that due to limitation of CodeGen design choices of today
Also, this OAS generation should be seen as accessory: I don't want to hard fail if I can't generate some metadata
